tasks.label: build-infer
args: set -euo pipefail; CXX=$(command -v g++-13 || command -v g++); ORT_DIR=${ORT_DIR:-/opt/onnxruntime}; mkdir -p build; "$CXX" -std=c++17 -O2 -g -Iinclude -I"$ORT_DIR"/include $(pkg-config --cflags opencv4) src/InferenceRunner.cpp src/main.cpp -L"$ORT_DIR"/lib -Wl,-rpath,"$ORT_DIR"/lib -lonnxruntime $(pkg-config --libs opencv4) -ldl -lpthread -o build/infer
